title: Cranberry Chocolate Oat Cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '160g porridge oats', '250g plain flour', '120g wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '160g dried cranberries', '80g white chocolate, chopped', '80g plain chocolate chips']
